markers.name: Bryn Shander
markers.description: The largest settlement in Icewind Dale, a walled town that serves as the region's hub of trade and commerce.
markers.notable: Market square, Town walls, Speaker Duvessa Shane

markers.name: Targos
markers.description: A fishing town on the shores of Maer Dualdon, known for its hardy fishermen and knucklehead trout.
markers.notable: Fishing fleet, The Luskan Arms tavern

markers.name: Caer-Konig
markers.description: A small town on the southern shore of Lac Dinneshere, known for its castle ruins.

markers.name: Caer-Dineval
markers.description: A small town on the shores of Lac Dinneshere, struggling with internal conflicts.

markers.name: Easthaven
markers.description: A town that serves as a gateway to the eastern reaches of Icewind Dale.
markers.notable: The White Lady Inn, Ferry service

markers.name: Good Mead
markers.description: A small town famous for its honey mead and beekeeping.

markers.name: Dougan's Hole
markers.description: A small knucklehead trout fishing village on the shore of Redwaters.

markers.name: Bremen
markers.description: A lumber town in the western part of Icewind Dale.

markers.name: Lonelywood
markers.description: A logging town surrounded by the Lonelywood Forest.

markers.name: Termalaine
markers.description: A gem-mining town known for its valuable stones.

markers.name: Kelvin's Cairn
markers.description: The only mountain in Icewind Dale, rising 1,800 feet above the tundra.

markers.name: Reghed Glacier
markers.description: A massive glacier that dominates the eastern part of Icewind Dale.
markers.notable: Glacier caves, Ancient ice, Tribal burial grounds

markers.name: Maer Dualdon
markers.description: The largest lake in Icewind Dale, source of knucklehead trout.
markers.notable: Largest lake, Knucklehead trout, Freshwater source

markers.name: Lac Dinneshere
markers.description: A deep, cold lake known for its excellent fishing.
markers.notable: Deep lake, Excellent fishing, Cold waters

markers.name: Redwaters
markers.description: A smaller lake with reddish water from mineral deposits.

markers.name: Ythryn
markers.description: The lost Netherese city, frozen in time within the Reghed Glacier.
markers.notable: Ancient magic, Netherese ruins, Powerful artifacts

markers.name: Id Ascendant
markers.description: A psionic research facility hidden beneath the ice.
markers.notable: Psionic experiments, Mind flayers, Hidden entrance

markers.name: Caves of Hunger
markers.description: A network of caverns beneath Kelvin's Cairn.

markers.name: Tribe of the Elk
markers.description: A nomadic Reghed tribe that follows elk herds.
markers.notable: Nomadic tribe, Elk herders, Seasonal migration

markers.name: Tribe of the Wolf
markers.description: A fierce Reghed tribe known for their wolf companions.
